creator: bugzilla@mdaniel.scdi.com
text:
I mean that in the most vague sense, but this patch scratches my itch.

When Region finds that the common border BP or IP padding is non-zero, it raises
an exception but does not detail the name of the offending region.

Created attachment 16417
Patch against svn HEAD to add regionName to the PropertyException message
creator: bugzilla@mdaniel.scdi.com

text: Patch applied. Thanks for your contribution
